original_text: For when they went up to the Valley of Eshcol and saw the land, they discouraged the heart of the people of Israel from going into the land that the Lord had given them.
korean_text: 그들이 에스골 골짜기에 올라가서 그 땅을 보고 이스라엘 자손을 낙심하게 하여서 여호와께서 그들에게 주신 땅으로 갈 수 없게 하였었느니라

sentences.original_text: For when they went up to the Valley of Eshcol
they discouraged the heart of the people of Israel
that the Lord had given them.
